DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this clinical study was to obtain type 1 diabetes data to identify models for glucose prediction and control and to construct a physiological pharmaco-kinetic/pharmaco-dynamic computer model of a type 1 diabetic person.
DOC.brief_title: Collection of Information-Rich Type 1 Diabetes Data
DOC.criteria: diabetes duration > 5 years HbA1c < or = 7.2% CSII treated for > 3 months Capable of being moderately, physically active for 20 minutes symptoms of diabetic late complications except simplex retinopathy pregnancy or nursing
